description: This is a C++ test source file for the 'FrameType' template class, utilizing Google Test framework to verify its buffer operations and object copying functionalities.

classes.name: FrameType
classes.description: Template class representing a data frame with buffer operations, including nested Writer and Reader classes.

methods.name: SetBuffer
methods.description: Sets a buffer segment within the FrameType object using specified offset and length.

methods.name: GetBuffer
methods.description: Retrieves a buffer segment from the FrameType object starting at the specified offset and length.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Gets or sets the size of the FrameType buffer.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears the contents of the FrameType buffer.
